title: party Collection – Watch Face
summary: Bring the party to your Wearable with these funny watch face customizations!
description: The ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ is a collection of bright watch faces for your Android Wear device!Its cheerful and fun design is guaranteed to put you into a good mood the moment you look at it - customize the bezel and the seconds hand in all colors of the rainbow to create your very own unique watch face! When you feel like it is time for a change, simply pick another of the flamboyant 100 color combinations that the ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ has to offer. Show your individual style, match the colors to your mood and have a great time. Transform your smartwatch into a colorful eye-catcher: Add a refreshing splash of color to your wrist to brighten your look and let time tick away in the colors of your choice.Which combination do you feel like wearing today? It’s up to you!‘party Collection – Watch Face’ is optimized for both round and square smartwatches. It is compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Sony SmartWatch 3 and more.How to install:1. Download the ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ watch faces on your smartphone or tablet. The app will be installed automatically on your Android Wear device.2. Open the Android Wear App, select ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ and customize your watch face to your liking. You can also long press on your smartwatch and select ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ there.Thank you for using ‘party Collection Watch Face’!Get in touch with HandyGamesTM:http://www.handy-games.comJoin us on Facebook:http://www.fb.com/handygamesFollow us on Instagram:http://instagram.com/handygamesStay tuned on Google+:http://goo.gl/qkjngmSubscribe to our channel on YouTube:http://goo.gl/2Kq6yYCheck news on Twitter:http://www.twitter.com/handy_gamesFollow us on Instagram:http://instagram.com/handygamesImprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/© www.handy-games.com GmbH
descriptionHTML:
The ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ is a collection of bright watch faces for your Android Wear device!
Its cheerful and fun design is guaranteed to put you into a good mood the moment you look at it - customize the bezel and the seconds hand in all colors of the rainbow to create your very own unique watch face! When you feel like it is time for a change, simply pick another of the flamboyant 100 color combinations that the ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ has to offer. Show your individual style, match the colors to your mood and have a great time. Transform your smartwatch into a colorful eye-catcher:
Add a refreshing splash of color to your wrist to brighten your look and let time tick away in the colors of your choice.
Which combination do you feel like wearing today? It’s up to you!

‘party Collection – Watch Face’ is optimized for both round and square smartwatches. It is compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Sony SmartWatch 3 and more.

How to install:
1. Download the ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ watch faces on your smartphone or tablet. The app will be installed automatically on your Android Wear device.
2. Open the Android Wear App, select ‘party Collection – Watch Face’ and customize your watch face to your liking. You can also long press on your smartwatch and select ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ there.

Thank you for using ‘party Collection Watch Face’!

comments: I like that it has multiple colors, on the numbers. However the green band that supposed to be on top of the minute marks dose not show up at all. It's just white. Pleas correct. Party pooper
